repl_description:
A fashion show website enabling event ticket purchases through Paystack payment integration, featuring automated digital ticket confirmations and newsletter communications via Zoho email services. The platform includes an event photo gallery with auto-sliding carousel and filterable collection grid functionality.

Key features and integrations:
- Paystack payment gateway integration
- Zoho email service integration for tickets and newsletters
- Digital ticket booking and confirmation system
- Newsletter subscription management
- Auto-sliding image carousel with mobile swipe gestures
- Filterable photo gallery with Classic/Contemporary categories
- Mobile-responsive design with optimized hero section
